query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST0201( MANDT , PSPID , POSID , CHK_KIND , CHASU , CODE2 , RCPT_DATE , REQ_DATE , ZZACTSS , LIFNR , WRBTR , CDATE , CTIME , AUSE , GBN , RCPT_BIGO , MIG_RCPT_DATE ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #PSPID# , #POSID# , #CHK_KIND# , #CHASU# , #CODE2# , #RCPT_DATE# , #CNFM_REQ_DATE# , #ZZACTSS# , #LIFNR# , #WRBTR# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , #AUSE# , '1' , #BIGO# , #MIG_RCPT_DATE# )
